pages.title: Depth Leggings
pages.text: Armor made out of $(l:e_item_strongest_diamond)Strongest Diamonds/el is even better than the one made from $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el. While the $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_armor)Deep Crystal Armor/el protects you pretty good from harm, the Depth Leggings allow the wearer to walk faster and negate all damage the player receives at the cost of some $(l:e_mana_player_mana)Mana/el instead of durability.
